original_text: Turn again, my daughters, go your way; for I am too old to have an husband. If I should say, I have hope, if I should have an husband also to night, and should also bear sons;
korean_text: 내 딸들아 되돌아 가라 나는 늙었으니 남편을 두지 못할지라 가령 내가 소망이 있다고 말한다든지 오늘 밤에 남편을 두어 아들들을 낳는다 하더라도

sentences.original_text: for I am too old to have an husband
If I should say, I have hope
if I should have an husband also to night
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 오늘 밤에 남편을 얻게 된다면
